GR13mabhedtu:94: mayā sārdhaṃ maheśāni vihāraṃ kuru yatnataḥ /

GR13mabhedtu:120: bhujyate kuṇḍalī devī iti cintāparo hi yaḥ /

GR13mabhedtu:122: evaṃ kṛte brahmarūpaḥ śivarūpaḥ svayaṃ hariḥ /
GR13mabhedtu:123: yogasiddhir bhavet tasya cāṣṭasiddhir bhaviṣyati // MBhT_3.11
GR13mabhedtu:124: śatrubhir dīyate yat tu kṛtrimaṃ dāruṇaṃ viṣam /
GR13mabhedtu:125: bhakṣaṇāt tat kṣaṇe devi hy amṛtaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ // MBhT_3.12
GR13mabhedtu:126: mantreṇa śodhitaṃ dravyaṃ bhakṣaṇād amṛtaṃ bhavet /
GR13mabhedtu:127: yadaiva kālakūṭaṃ tu samudramathane priye // MBhT_3.13
GR13mabhedtu:128: tadā cānena manunā tatkṣaṇāt khāditaṃ mayā // MBhT_3.14
GR13mabhedtu:129: sarpākārā kuṇḍalinī yā devī paramā kalā /

GR13mabhedtu:131: iti te kathitaṃ kānte bhojanasya vidhānakam /

GR13mabhedtu:135: vada me parameśāna homakuṇḍaṃ tu kīdṛśam // MBhT_3.17

GR13mabhedtu:147: homakuṇḍam idaṃ devi sarvatantre pariṣkṛtam // MBhT_3.23
GR13mabhedtu:151: śūdrasyaikāhutir devi muktiś cāpi caturvidhā // MBhT_3.25

GR13mabhedtu:158: iti te kathitaṃ kānte tantrāṇāṃ sāram uttamam /
GR13mabhedtu:159: na vaktavyaṃ paśor agre śapatho me tvayi priye // MBhT_3.29
GR13mabhedtu:162: jātibhedaṃ na kathitam idānīṃ tat prakāśaya // MBhT_3.30
GR13mabhedtu:167: brāhmaṇaḥ parameśāni yadi pānādikaṃ caret // MBhT_3.32
GR13mabhedtu:168: tatkṣaṇāc chivarūpo 'sau satyaṃ satyaṃ hi śailaje // MBhT_3.33
GR13mabhedtu:169: toye toyaṃ yathā līnaṃ yathā tejasi tejasam /
GR13mabhedtu:170: ghaṭe bhagne yathākāśaṃ vāyau vāyur yathā priye // MBhT_3.34

GR13mabhedtu:174: sā nārī mānavī madyapāne devi na saṃśayaḥ // MBhT_3.36
GR13mabhedtu:175: sūkṣmasūtre yathā vahnir dehamadhye tathā śivā /

GR13mabhedtu:178: madyapānaṃ vinā devi tajjñānaṃ na hi labhyate /

GR13mabhedtu:318: gānena tumburuḥ sākṣād dānena vāsavo yathā /

GR13mabhedtu:346: tadaiva grahaṇaṃ devi śaktiyukto yadā śivaḥ // MBhT_6.10
GR13mabhedtu:348: dakṣanetre cumbane ca bhāskaragrahaṇaṃ tadā // MBhT_6.11
